Class ReplyAction

java.lang.Object
com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.dispatching.reply.internal.ReplyAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reply
@Internal public final class ReplyAction extends Object implements Reply
Implementation of Reply handling all the business logic of sending messages.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReplyAction

      public ReplyAction(GenericInteractionCreateEvent event, InteractionDefinition definition, MessageResolver messageResolver, InteractionDefinition.ReplyConfig replyConfig)
      Constructs a new ReplyAction.
      Parameters:
      event - the corresponding GenericInteractionCreateEvent
      definition - the corresponding InteractionDefinition. This is mostly needed by the ConfigurableReply
      messageResolver - the MessageResolver instance to use for message resolution
      replyConfig - the InteractionDefinition.ReplyConfig to use

    • reply

      public Message reply(String message, Entry... placeholder)
      Description copied from interface: Reply
      Acknowledgement of this event with a text message.
      Specified by:
      reply in interface Reply
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send or the localization key
      placeholder - the placeholders to use to perform localization, see [I18n#localize(Locale , String, Entry...) ]
      Returns:
      the Message that got created
